name: Cabals: Magic & Battle Cards
description: Cabals combines the strategic deck building of card games and tactics of a chess like board game. The classic collectible card game is now designed from the ground up for PC. Choose your side, build your perfect deck and battle in the War of Cabals to decide the fate of humankind!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP SP2+/Windows® Vista/Windows® 7/Windows® 8/Windows® 10 Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo E6600 (2.4 GHz) or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ (2.6 GHz) or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT (512 MB) or ATI Radeon HD 4850 (512 MB) or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
